concept.display: The source responded that he or she did not know the information needed or requested.
concept.definition: The source responded that he or she did not know the information needed or requested.

concept.display: The source asserts that the thing in question exists, but additional information is unknown. For example, Jim knows he has a dentist, but not recall her name.
concept.definition: The source asserts that the thing in question exists, but additional information is unknown. For example, Jim knows he has a dentist, but not recall her name.

concept.display: Nothing of a type of thing is known to exists, e.g., the siblings of an only child. Also use this code to represent a 'none of the above' answer
concept.definition: Nothing of a type of thing is known to exists, e.g., the siblings of an only child. Also use this code to represent a 'none of the above' answer
